Posts.Content: Don't know about the IV but from numerous sources studies have found that you can take up to 10,000mg a day without any toxic reations.  But ou DO want to have a quality substance and I have been told by my nurse advocate that you MUST drink plenty of water since Vit C is water soluble.  Try looking up Linus Pauling on the internet.  Also Ralph Moss
Posts.Title: Vitamin c iv
